title: House Comparison App
close_reason: House Comparison App complete with all features: Data Entry page, Data View page with hub-and-spoke visualization, Google Maps integration, school catchment lookups, train station finder, Flinders St commute calculations

title: JSON Database Schema
description: JSON file-based database for storing property data. Schema includes: address, rooms (bedrooms/bathrooms/garage), price range, auction date, and land area. File will be committed to repo.
close_reason: All implemented: Data Entry page with URL input, JSON schema in houses.json, saveToDatabase() displays JSON for manual copy/commit

title: Design hub-and-spoke visualization
description: Create star/hub-and-spoke visual with property at center, surrounded by: schools, train station, commute times. Use graphics, icons for clean non-cluttered display. Refer to dataview.png wireframe.
close_reason: Enhanced hub-and-spoke visualization with CSS Grid layout, animated connections, color-coded nodes, hover effects, and responsive design

title: Set up frontend project structure
description: Initialize the frontend-only project. Pure JS with web API calls, no backend server. Will be hosted on koustubh25.github.io.
close_reason: Created frontend project structure with index.html, CSS styles, and JS modules (config, utils, scraper, maps, app)

title: Calculate Flinders Street Station travel time
description: Calculate travel time to Flinders Street Station during peak hours on a working day from: (a) the nearest train station, (b) the property address directly.
close_reason: Implemented MapsService.getTravelToFlinders() with peak hour scheduling. Calculates transit, driving, walking routes from property and via nearest station

title: Data Entry Page
description: Frontend page for entering realestate.com.au URLs. Includes URL input form, web scraper integration, and JSON storage. Only visible on localhost/127.0.0.1, hidden on production (github.io).
close_reason: All implemented: Data Entry page with URL input, JSON schema in houses.json, saveToDatabase() displays JSON for manual copy/commit

title: Create address dropdown with autocomplete
description: Build dropdown that accepts text input and shows addresses from the JSON database. Center of the Data View page. Can also accept Google Maps locations.
close_reason: Implemented address dropdown with database suggestions and Google Places autocomplete integration

title: Add modern UI styling and animations
description: Make the app artistic with fancy UI, modern design, graphics, icons, and animations. Focus on the Data View page as the main visual centerpiece.
close_reason: Added modern UI with dark theme, CSS Grid layout, animated hub pulse, color-coded nodes, hover effects, shimmer animations, and responsive design

title: Implement primary school catchment lookup
description: Find primary school in the catchment area using findmyschool.vic.gov.au. Steps: (1) Enter address in #address-search-field, (2) Select latest year (2026), (3) Click 'Primary' radio button. Parse result from #SchoolInfo-header (h2) for school name. Also get school address, phone, and distance from #NearestSchools. Use Google Maps for walking time calculation.
close_reason: Implemented primary and secondary school catchment lookup via SchoolService.getPrimarySchool() and getSecondarySchool() with fallback links to findmyschool.vic.gov.au

title: Design and implement JSON schema
description: Create JSON schema with fields: address, rooms (bedrooms, bathrooms, garage), price (range), auction_date, area (mÂ²). See wireframe dataentrywithdb.png.
close_reason: Implemented JSON schema with fields: address, rooms (bedrooms/bathrooms/carSpaces), price (min/max/displayText), auctionDate, floorPlan (landSize/unit), propertyType

title: Save scraped data to JSON file
description: Implement logic to save scraped property data to the JSON database file. User will manually commit the updated file to the repo.
close_reason: All implemented: Data Entry page with URL input, JSON schema in houses.json, saveToDatabase() displays JSON for manual copy/commit

title: Create initial empty database file
description: Create properties.json with empty array or sample structure for the database.
close_reason: Created initial houses.json database file with sample property data

title: Data View Page
description: Main decision-making page with hub-and-spoke visualization. Displays property info, school catchments (primary/secondary), nearest train station, commute times, and Flinders Street Station travel time. Modern, artistic UI with animations.
close_reason: Implemented Data View Page with hub-and-spoke visualization, property info display, school catchment links, train station info, and Flinders St commute times

title: Implement Google Maps API integration
description: Set up Google Maps API for distances, travel times, and location data. Required for school catchments, train stations, and commute calculations.
close_reason: Added Google Maps API with Places and Geometry libraries. MapsService provides geocoding, directions, nearest station search, and autocomplete

title: Implement web scraper for realestate.com.au
description: Extract property data from realestate.com.au pages using outerHTML parsing. Extract: address (h1.property-info-address), rooms/area (ul.property-info__primary-features), price range (property-info__middle-content with Indicative price).
close_reason: Implemented Scraper.parsePropertyHtml() and scrapeFromUrl() with CORS proxy support. Extracts address, rooms, price, area from realestate.com.au HTML

title: Implement localhost-only visibility for Data Entry
description: Hide the Data Entry page when running on production (github.io). Only show when running on localhost or 127.0.0.1.
close_reason: Implemented localhost-only visibility using Config.isLocalhost() and CSS class 'localhost-only' that hides elements on production

title: Implement secondary school catchment lookup
description: Find secondary school in the catchment area using findmyschool.vic.gov.au. Steps: (1) Enter address in #address-search-field, (2) Select latest year (2026), (3) Click 'Secondary' radio button. Parse result from #SchoolInfo-header (h2) for school name. Also get school address, phone, and distance from #NearestSchools. Use Google Maps for walking time calculation.
close_reason: Implemented primary and secondary school catchment lookup via SchoolService.getPrimarySchool() and getSecondarySchool() with fallback links to findmyschool.vic.gov.au

title: Find nearest train station
description: Identify the nearest train station to the property. Display commute methods with time for each (bus, car, walking) using Google Maps data.
close_reason: Implemented MapsService.findNearestTrainStation() using Google Places API with nearby search for train_station type, includes walking directions to station

title: Create URL input form with submit button
description: Build the input form UI that accepts realestate.com.au links with a submit button. Refer to wireframe dataentry.png.
close_reason: Created URL input form with submit button in Data Entry page for realestate.com.au links

title: Integrate with findmyschool.vic.gov.au
description: Implement integration with https://www.findmyschool.vic.gov.au for school catchment lookups. Input: property address. Output: school name, address, phone, distance. Parse HTML elements: #address-search-field (input), #SchoolInfo-header (school name result), #NearestSchools (distance info). Must handle year selection (choose latest) and school type toggle (Primary/Secondary).
close_reason: Created SchoolService with findmyschool integration. Provides lookup with CORS proxy fallback and direct links to findmyschool.vic.gov.au for manual lookups
